title: January 2017 Coach of the Month – Alex Gardiner - Winnipeg | Globalnews.ca
text:
January 30, 2017 6:56 pm Updated: January 30, 2017 6:57 pm January 2017 Coach of the Month – Alex Gardiner By Mitch Rosset Reporter/Anchor Global News What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' editorial staff without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... X What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - Listen 
When it comes to putting runners on track for success, Alex Gardiner knows exactly where to start. 
The Manitoba Bisons track and field coach has been teaching athletics for more than four decades. He’s also helped put the Canadian Olympic Committee on pace to win more medals. 
WATCH: Coach of the Month profiles from the past year. December 2016 Coach of the Month: Blaine Malo
